thread.title: Theatre and Shopping weekend in the city
thread.title_full: Theatre and Shopping weekend in the city - Review of The Chatwal, A Luxury Collection Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: piastl
title: Theatre and Shopping weekend in the city
text: Central locations for theatre and shopping in mid town. Clean lobby with friendly staff. Concierge gave us the best recommendation for a special pre show birthday dinner. Rooms, by NYC standards are roomy with good bath products available. We will return to visit the Chatwal soon.
